# selectionAccessory

**Instance Property**

An accessory that displays place information when a person selects a place.

## Declaration

```swift
get selectionAccessory(): PlaceSelectionAccessory | null;
set selectionAccessory(value: PlaceSelectionAccessory | null);
```

## Discussion

You need to initialize an annotation with an instance of a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/AnnotationConstructorOptions/place] so that the accessory displays the correct place.

## Managing selection accessories

- **selectionAccessoryOffset**: An offset that changes the selection accessory’s default anchor point.
